# Read data

```{r}
df <-
  "C:/Users/chanb/Box Sync/Facebook pilot - Statisticians/Lifetime ad performance by day, no consents or completions 5.19.17.xlsx" %>% 
  read_excel() %>% 
  filter(row_number() > 1)
names(df) <- c("date",
               "ad",
               "clicksTotal",
               "linkClicksTotal",
               "impressions",
               "clicksUnique",
               "linkClicksUnique",
               "reach",
               "reactions",
               "comments",
               "shares")
df <-
  df %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(as.integer(date), origin = as.Date("1900-01-01"))) %>% 
  mutate(image = factor(gsub("\\s-.*", "", ad)),
         text = factor(gsub(".*-\\s", "", ad))) %>% 
  mutate(text = gsub("Social norms", "SocialNorms", text)) %>% 
  mutate(text = factor(text)) %>% 
  mutate(image = relevel(image, ref = "Computer"),
         text = relevel(text, ref = "Incentive")) %>% 
  select(-c(ad))
str(df)
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  group_by(image, text) %>% 
  summarize(nDays = length(date), minDate = min(date), maxDate = max(date)) %>% 
  kable
```
